newsitem.title: USA: Breed Technologies names finance chief.
newsitem.headline: Breed Technologies names finance chief.

text.p: Breed Technologies Inc said Thursday it has appointed Frank Gnisci as executive vice president and chief financial officer to manage its worldwide financial operations.
Gnisci joins Breed from Terex Corp, a manufacturer of heavy-duty and off-highway trucks and mobile cranes, where he served as vice president of finance since 1994.

Gnisci replaces Edward McFadden, who left the company in June to pursue other interests. Robert Fincher, vice president of finance, served as interim CFO while the search for the new CFO was being conducted, the company said.
Breed is a supplier of automotive occupant safety systems and steering wheels.
